entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
